member.name: T:CA.Web.Mvc.Areas.Admin.Controllers.CategoryController
member.summary: Category Controller This controller does handle requests related to Catgegory. It add, delete, update, fetch categories. It also does filter based fetch.

member.name: M:CA.Web.Mvc.Areas.Admin.Controllers.CategoryController.Index(CA.Core.Application.Contracts.Handlers.Category.Queries.GetAllCategoryQuery)
member.summary: Get All Categories. This method is responsible for fetching all categories. Here GetAllCategoryQuery pass some parameter like PageSize, PageNumber for papginated results.
